revised_title: Discovery of Distinct Earths and Their Spectral Properties
tldr: The author discusses the discovery of distinct earths and their spectral properties. They compare their findings with those of M. de Boisbaudran and explain how their methods and results differ. The author's phosphorescent lines occur at the yttrium end of the fractionation, while M. de Boisbaudran's fluorescent bands are at the terbium end.
